name: Elder Ghost Boar
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elder ghost boar makes two tusk attacks.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the ghost boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) slashing damage If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Jaunt
special_abilities.desc: When the ghost boar moves, it becomes temporarily incorporeal. It can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage and is pushed to the closest unoccupied space if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If the elder ghost boar takes 20 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hp, it is reduced to 1 hp instead.

special_abilities.name: Spirit Conduit
special_abilities.desc: When a creature dies within 30 feet of the ghost boar, its spirit can possess the boar, incapacitating the boar for up to 1 minute. During this time, the spirit is affected by the speak with dead spell, speaking through the ghost boar's mouth.
